title: Emoticon
summary: An emoticon (/ɪˈmoʊtɪkɒn/, ə-MOH-tə-kon, rarely pronounced /ɪˈmɒtɪkɒn/),[1][2][3][4] short for "emotion icon",[5] also known simply as an emote, is a pictorial representation of a facial expression using characters—usually punctuation marks, numbers, and letters—to express a person's feelings, mood or reaction, or as a time-saving method.
